title: Hurricane Season Update: Tropical Cyclone Could Form Today
description: A disturbance in the Atlantic could develop into a tropical depression on Monday, according to the National Hurricane Center.
content:
Forecasters are monitoring a system in the Atlantic that has the potential to strengthen into a "short-lived" tropical depression on Monday.
According to the National Weather Service (NWS), a tropic… [+2537 chars]
de: Update zur Hurrikansaison: Tropischer Wirbelsturm könnte sich heute bilden. Nach Angaben des National Hurricane Center könnte sich eine Störung im Atlantik am Montag zu einem tropischen Tiefdruckgebiet entwickeln.
en: Hurricane Season Update: Tropical Cyclone Could Form Today. A disturbance in the Atlantic could develop into a tropical depression on Monday, according to the National Hurricane Center.
la: Procellae Season Update: Tropical Cyclone hodie formare potuit. Perturbatio in Atlantico in depressionem tropicam die Lunae, secundum Centrum Nationale Hurricane, potest evolvere.

title: Tropical Storm Andrea, first of Atlantic hurricane season, has formed

content:
MIAMI -- Tropical Storm Andrea, the first tropical storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, has formed, the National Hurricane Center said Tuesday.
Andrea was located 1,205 miles (1,940 kilometers) w… [+471 chars]

title: Tropical Storm Andrea, first of Atlantic hurricane season, has formed
description: The tropical storm is expected to weaken Tuesday night and dissipate by Wednesday night.
content:
The tropical storm is expected to weaken Tuesday night and dissipate by Wednesday night.
This story appeared on pbs.org, 2025-06-24 15:11:58.
de: Der Tropensturm Andrea, der erste der Hurrikansaison im Atlantik, hat sich gebildet. Es wird erwartet, dass sich der Tropensturm in der Nacht zum Dienstag abschwächt und sich bis Mittwochnacht auflöst.
en: Tropical Storm Andrea, first of Atlantic hurricane season, has formed. The tropical storm is expected to weaken Tuesday night and dissipate by Wednesday night.
la: Tropical Storm Andrea, primus tempestatis Atlantici tempestatis, condidit. Tropica tempestas exspectatur debilitare Martis noctem et dissipare per noctem mercurii.

title: LIVE MAP: Tropical Storm Andrea, first of Atlantic hurricane season, has formed
description: Andrea was located 1,205 miles (1,940 kilometers) west of the Azores, forecasters said. Maximum sustained winds were at 40 mph (65 mph) and the cyclone was traveling east-northeast at 17 mph (28 mph).
content: Andrea was located 1,205 miles (1,940 kilometers) west of the Azores, forecasters said. Maximum sustained winds were at 40 mph (65 mph) and the cyclone was traveling east-northeast at 17 mph (28 mph)… [+54 chars]
de: LIVE-KARTE: Der Tropensturm Andrea, der erste der Hurrikansaison im Atlantik, hat sich gebildet. Laut Meteorologen befand sich Andrea 1.205 Meilen (1.940 Kilometer) westlich der Azoren. Die maximalen anhaltenden Winde betrugen 40 Meilen pro Stunde (65 Meilen pro Stunde) und der Zyklon bewegte sich mit einer Geschwindigkeit von 17 Meilen pro Stunde (28 Meilen pro Stunde) von Ost nach Nordost.
en: LIVE MAP: Tropical Storm Andrea, first of Atlantic hurricane season, has formed. Andrea was located 1,205 miles (1,940 kilometers) west of the Azores, forecasters said. Maximum sustained winds were at 40 mph (65 mph) and the cyclone was traveling east-northeast at 17 mph (28 mph).
la: LIVE MAP: Tropical Storm Andrea, primum tempestatis Atlantici, condidit. Andrea sita est 1,205 milia passuum (1,940 chiliometrorum) occidentalem Azorum, forecasters dictum. Maxime ventis sustinentibus 40 mph (65 mph) erat et cyclus orientalis septentrionalis ad 17 mph (28 mph).

title: First named tropical storm forms in Atlantic. What this means for 2025 hurricane season
description: The first named storm of the 2025 season forms in the Atlantic Ocean. Tropical Storm Andrea provides insight on 2025 hurricane season outlook.
content:
The first named tropical storm of the 2025 season, Tropical Storm Andrea, formed in the Atlantic Ocean on June 24.
As of Tuesday morning, the storm was spinning in the open waters of the Atlantic, h… [+2587 chars]
de: Der erste benannte tropische Sturm bildet sich im Atlantik. Was das für die Hurrikansaison 2025 bedeutet. Der erste benannte Sturm der Saison 2025 entsteht im Atlantischen Ozean. Tropensturm Andrea gibt Einblick in die Aussichten für die Hurrikansaison 2025.
en: First named tropical storm forms in Atlantic. What this means for 2025 hurricane season. The first named storm of the 2025 season forms in the Atlantic Ocean. Tropical Storm Andrea provides insight on 2025 hurricane season outlook.
la: Primo nomine tropicae formae in Atlantico tempestas est. Quid hoc significat 2025 tempus tempestatis. Prima tempestas nominata est 2025 temporum formarum in Oceano Atlantico. Tropical Storm Andrea providet intuitum 2025 tempestatis temporis prospectum.

title: Vital hurricane satellites to go dark weeks into Atlantic storm season— and NOAA rips media for causing panic
description: A NOAA spokesperson clarified that a microwave instrument on another satellite will still provide crucial readings.
content: Vital hurricane-tracking satellites are expected to go dark just weeks into the Atlantic storm season and the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration is pointing fingers at the media for fuel… [+3518 chars]
de: Wichtige Hurrikan-Satelliten stehen vor düsteren Wochen in der Atlantik-Sturmsaison – und NOAA zerreißt Medien, weil sie Panik ausgelöst haben. Ein NOAA-Sprecher stellte klar, dass ein Mikrowelleninstrument auf einem anderen Satelliten weiterhin wichtige Messwerte liefern wird.
en: Vital hurricane satellites to go dark weeks into Atlantic storm season— and NOAA rips media for causing panic. A NOAA spokesperson clarified that a microwave instrument on another satellite will still provide crucial readings.
la: Satellites procellae vitales ut hebdomades obscuras in tempestatem Atlanticum eant — et NOAA media scindit ad terrorem causandum. A NOAA prolocutor declaravit proin instrumentum in alio satellite declarari adhuc lectionibus decretoriis praebere.

title: Hurricane forecasters up chances for another Atlantic tropical cyclone
description: The system is expected to bring heavy rains to parts of Mexico and Guatemala over the next few days.
content: A storm system brewing off the east coast of Mexico now has a 70% chance of forming into a tropical cyclone in the next 48 hours, the National Hurricane Center said on June 28, an increase from previ… [+3889 chars]
de: Hurrikanprognostiker schätzen die Wahrscheinlichkeit eines weiteren tropischen Wirbelsturms im Atlantik. Es wird erwartet, dass das System in den nächsten Tagen heftige Regenfälle in Teilen Mexikos und Guatemalas mit sich bringt.
en: Hurricane forecasters up chances for another Atlantic tropical cyclone. The system is expected to bring heavy rains to parts of Mexico and Guatemala over the next few days.
la: Procellae forecasters sunt casus in alio cyclo Atlantico tropico. Ratio expectatur pluvias ad partes Mexici et Guatimalenses per proximos paucos dies afferre.

title: Tropical Depression 2 forms in Gulf, expected to strengthen before reaching Mexico
description: If it does reach tropical storm status, which would be under the name Tropical Storm Barry, it would become the second named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season
content: An area of low pressure being monitored in the western Gulf developed into a tropical depression Saturday afternoon that forecasters said could strengthen into a tropical storm by the time it makes l… [+1826 chars]
de: Im Golf bildet sich das tropische Tiefdruckgebiet 2, das sich voraussichtlich verstärken wird, bevor es Mexiko erreicht. Sollte er den Status eines Tropensturms erreichen, was unter dem Namen Tropensturm Barry der Fall wäre, wäre er der zweitgenannte Sturm der atlantischen Hurrikansaison
en: Tropical Depression 2 forms in Gulf, expected to strengthen before reaching Mexico. If it does reach tropical storm status, which would be under the name Tropical Storm Barry, it would become the second named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season
la: Tropical Depressione 2 forms in Sinu, speratur se confirmaturum antequam Mexico attingeret. Si ad statum tempestatis tropicae, quae sub nomine Tropical Barry Barry esset, secunda tempestas tempestatis tempestatis Atlantici nominatur.

title: National Hurricane Center issues tropical storm warning for Tropical Depression Two. What to know
description: There were no threats or expected tropical development near Florida as flooding rains in a disorganized tropical depression approached Mexico.
content:
Heavy rains were beginning Sunday morning as Tropical Depression Two caused the National Hurricane Center to issue a tropical storm warning for the Gulf coast of Mexico.
There were no threats or exp… [+8799 chars]
de: Das National Hurricane Center gibt eine Tropensturmwarnung für Tropical Depression Two heraus. Was Sie wissen sollten. Es gab keine Bedrohungen oder erwartete tropische Entwicklung in der Nähe von Florida, als sich überschwemmende Regenfälle in einem unorganisierten tropischen Tiefdruckgebiet Mexiko näherten.
en: National Hurricane Center issues tropical storm warning for Tropical Depression Two. What to know. There were no threats or expected tropical development near Florida as flooding rains in a disorganized tropical depression approached Mexico.
la: National Hurricane Centrum quaestionibus tropicae tempestatis monitum pro Tropical Depressione Duo. Quid scire. Nullae minae aut expectatae progressus tropicae prope Floridam sicut pluviae inundantes in depressione tropica inordinata Mexico appropinquaverunt.

title: Twin tropical systems threaten to pound battered Mexico. Will US get hit?
description: One of the tropical depressions gaining strength off the coast of Mexico could become a "significant hurricane" by Wednesday.
content: Two tropical depressions gaining strength off the coasts of Mexico could both become named storms Sunday and one could become a "significant hurricane" by Wednesday, the National Hurricane Center war… [+3964 chars]
de: Zwillingstropensysteme drohen, das gebeutelte Mexiko zu treffen. Werden die USA getroffen? Eines der an Stärke gewinnenden tropischen Tiefdruckgebiete vor der Küste Mexikos könnte sich bis Mittwoch zu einem „bedeutenden Hurrikan“ entwickeln.
en: Twin tropical systems threaten to pound battered Mexico. Will US get hit?. One of the tropical depressions gaining strength off the coast of Mexico could become a "significant hurricane" by Wednesday.
la: Didymus systemata tropica minas Mexicum quassatum minant. Nos adepto ledo ?. Una e depressione tropica in oram Mexici vi auctae fieri potuit "turbo significans" Mercurii die.

title: Will Potential Tropical Storm Chantal Ruin Your 4th of July? What To Know
description: The third named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season could form near Florida during Fourth of July weekend.
content:
There's a chance that Tropical Storm Chantal will form near Florida during Fourth of July weekend, which may dampen holiday festivities in the Sunshine State.
The biggest threat from the developing … [+2960 chars]
de: Wird der potenzielle Tropensturm Chantal Ihren 4. Juli ruinieren? Was Sie wissen sollten. Der dritte benannte Sturm der atlantischen Hurrikansaison könnte sich am Wochenende des 4. Juli in der Nähe von Florida bilden.
en: Will Potential Tropical Storm Chantal Ruin Your 4th of July? What To Know. The third named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season could form near Florida during Fourth of July weekend.
la: Potentia Tropical Storm Chantal Ruin Your 4th July? Quid To know. Tertia tempestas appellata tempestatis Atlantici apud Floridam tempore quarto mensis Iulii formare potuit.
